articles.title: Americans evacuated from Diamond Princess cruise ship now under two-week quarantine in US
articles.description: Jeri Seratti-Goldman and her husband, who’s diagnosed with the coronavirus, are under quarantine after evacuating from the Diamond Princess cruise ship.

articles.description: Her daughter carved the message in snow outside of her hospital window.

articles.title: Coronavirus fears prompt neighbors of California mom, daughter in self-quarantine to call cops
articles.description: A mother in California who is under self-quarantine with her daughter claims a neighbor called the police on them out of fears they could spread the deadly coronavirus.

articles.title: Woman plays violin during brain surgery to remove tumor
articles.description: Her surgeon, who shares a mutual passion for music, chose to have her play the violin to ensure no damage was done to her right frontal lobe during the surgery.
articles.content:
The incredible moment an orchestra violinist played her instrument while surgeons operated on her brain was captured on video and has quickly gone viral.
Dagmar Turner, 53, underwent surgery to remove an aggressive brain tumor on Jan. 31 at King’s College Ho… [+2161 chars]

articles.description: China is no longer simply an economic rival of the United States. But instead of protecting us from this existential threat, our leadership class collaborates with them.

There are serious long-term problems facing America, as we've told you about for years on this show. Thanks to outsourcing, this country no longer has the same reserve of stable middle-class manufacturing jobs we did even 30 years ago.

articles.title: Dr. Peter Hotez: This spring three infectious epidemics may be coming to a neighborhood near you
articles.description: There is a significant risk that three major respiratory infections will soon break out in many parts of the United States.
